### File Type: - **PNG** is recommended for designs that need transparency. - **JPG** can be used if transparency is not required. ### File Size Limit: - TeePublic allows a maximum file size of **25 MB**. ### Aspect Ratio: - The recommended aspect ratio is **5:6** (width:height), which corresponds to the 4500 x 5400 pixel size. ### Important Tips: - **Keep Important Details Centered**: Make sure that the key elements of your design are centered to ensure they appear correctly on the main preview images. - **Transparent Backgrounds**: Use transparent backgrounds for designs meant to be printed on different colored fabrics.

Chelsea and I are not doing good. We're having alot of problems. I have not been a good husband. I have been very appcent and just not a partner. We have recently talked and I like snapped out of my fog that I have been in Like I feel I have been in a fog for like 2 years man.

So right now I'm doing what I have to do be the man I wanna be. We wanna work on our marriage and she wants it to work but is afraid it won't. Which is fair because I have given her no hope to think that is even an option

A depression fog and metal. Just putting all my energy into the wrong things for the wrong reasons From what I understand she needs me to keep doing what I'm doing. Getting better for myself not just for her I used to say that you need to be happy by yourself and then be in a marriage. Some how I lost sight of that. And I'm actually excited to be working on being an even better jon

Like I felt like getting a better job and making more money would fix everything. Instead of just taking some weight off of here. Like house work and other responsibilities that I could have helped with

I just was not myself. I was not Jon. I was like a dead person walking around I think because of us having talks before and me not really understanding. Or that the damage is already done and there is no fixing
I haven't me truth full of my emotions. I'd lie about stupid stuff for like no rreason. I completely abbaned who I was and like became a compasant fuck
Like did you clean the room and I really didn't. Like just stupid stuff
We both have issues that we have to work on. We both have to be happy again.
She was diagnosed with hormones in balance so her mood is changing like every two weeks. I want a life where we can openly communicate and thrive and grow Two things.
And that's what I'm realizing. I'm working on being the man I wanna be period. At some point I started to hate myself and didn't stop.
I person who wants to learn and grow till the day I die. I wanna be able to do things on my own with out feeling bad about others helping of feeling like a burden
She needs me to be a partner. Not just some man chuld Child
Taking care of my self. Taking care of our home, being more independent Which I'm Taking steps to do
Yes it does. That's like the biggest thing I wanna change man

Like I know you guys all just think I'm lazy and don't wanna drive. I do. I just have alot of ptsd I'm working on I think she has been let down before whybshould this time be different. Right now how I'm feeling I trust that I'm on the right path
That's my mind set right now. I'm moving right now and I have to keep doing that or I'm gonna die
I understand that no. It's like someone replace a broken part in me. Idk man it's wild

I think she finally showed how bad things were. Instead of trying to hide how she felt because she didn't wanna hurt my feelings So what are you doing, right now, to make your life together better. What is your PLAN?

So we had this talk last Friday. And since then I have a schedule I keep. I get up like and hour and half before work and clean the house. Rather that be sweeping or doing the dishes. I have been so behind on that it's not even funny. I cleaned out my entire office and got it back to where somone can move again. I have been applying to 5 jobs a day to get me out of this place i am now. I emailed a new therapist to start up talking again. Which will also help with driving.
It was important to you to be a ranked Hearthstone player, and you made it work. I said to myself I'm out of this job June. Even if that means just go working at fast food

She's my world man. I'm so sad and ashamed that I did this. But I did and wanna fix it I thought that would be a good timeline to find like a care job and if not something to just get me out of there job and if not something to just get me out of there I said to her if this is the end I'll be ok. I'll be sad but I'll be ok and gonna keep doing what I'm doing for me
I need to say that. I need to be happy for me. I need heath care for my shots That's something indo need

I think that if I just keep doing what I'm doing it will slowy gain trust again. I need her to be able to forgive. Not forget but know that is what's this to work as well. Just got set up with my new therapist!!! Boomb Got an interview for best buy!!!!! Booiiii

We making movess So my thinking is work there while taking insurance license course. Friends of mine don't from home. There moving up here and wanna get something going on there own. Just thinking long term
my feelings
She just could not hide her feelings anymore and I don't want her to
Kinda I did but then had to leave. At my mom's now
She is not
She got a place in bethel. She's living her best life Click to Load Preview youtu.be I have been watching so much of this guy. And makes so much sense
I have no realized how much trauma I have. Like they way I think and act. I became like a yes man to her. At one point I stop listing to her and just trierd to fix

I'm just happy that I see these issues now and actually wanna work on them. Like kept think before that it was her. Her problems. When in reality it was me and my lack of understanding her emotions and needs because I was to worried of filling my cup.

I understand that this is not a race to just be happy again. This is about finding answers to that I didn't even know where there. It's going to take time it's going to be painful and uncomfortable but I can't keep living like this. I need to get up I wanna tell her this
Her feelings. Make our home and relationship a safe place to talk about feelings and emotions
I didn't do it. I made it so that she felt like she could not be honest with her emotions. Even thought she is a therapist she is still human

I think the secound one. She was to afraid that I would spiral or get defensive and not truly hear her needs My biggest thing man is driving and getting out of this debt. Like I'm gonna call the bank and see if we can come to a settle ment of the one card. If I can get that 12k one down to something I can put that money so many more places that would really help
Honestly I don't care anymore. I'll take that hit. I'll take a hit and work my way back. Marathon brother. Marathon
What's a none profit debt agency
I'm sorry man. In my eyes that was just a question. You and meg have helped me now in ways that you can not understand. I truly mean that. And everything you just said is absolutely right.

Your right I did not understand. I thought it was a hit on my credit alone cause those cards are in my name. I thought your credit went down and then you built it up. I didn't full understand In my eyes your are the smart person I know. I hold you with so much respect it's not even funny man. I understand that's unfair to you Thank you for saying what you did. Pointing out these bad habits and the impact they have on the people I love really helps me. So I really do appreciate it

I do. I'm starting to see her tomorrow. And me only saying marathon was me trying to stay in that mindset of keep going. I honestly didn't mean for it to sound any different. I'm sorry Damian. I have been running from everything.

It's in there brother. I have been reading the dmv book every night. I think I'm trying to fix all my problems at once instead of picking a road and finishing. And I say this! You will be the secound person who I drive around with when I get my license I can control studying and working on my driving fear. I can do this I will do this Look at me. I defaulted back to money. Running from one problem
“I swear this is the last time”
Thank you. I need hard truths right now. I need it all man. I need to fell this stuff.
I'm actively seeing that now.
No problem. You listen when you can super excited
How did it go seeing Chelsea. Terrible. She is like done with me
Are you ok talking about this. I took what you said you heart yesterday and I don't wanna make you feel that way about me any more
It’s just that simple. It s just that simple. And it’s true even now.

In riding man. Last night I took responsibility for everything I did to Chelsea. I layed it all out. I could not see I was hurting her till it was to late. She told me she has like nothing left. I understand. Then if that's it I wanna know so I can move on and heal. Like right now I told her about the Debit thing and gave her a big hug and said like I can finally help out more in that area and get you out of debt as well. And she just like said I'm happy for you and went back into her office. I know I'm just reacting off of hurt and she has every right not to trust me. It still just hurts. But I still got up did my dishes and made the bed. I have been thinking of going to school for massage therapy People have said it before I'm thinking now it's a good idea
Idk. I just got to get these out there man. Even if there wrong. I gotta say them.
I honestly do not know

I just need to say how I felt there buddy. Me just keeping eveyting in has just lead me here. And I don't wanna keep doing that doing that I think she would say something like I'm sorry but that's how I feel

Oh no I didn't mean telling her that. I ment like telling you or my friends instead of sitting on it. I did not think about saying anything to her. I am. I downlaed the pa driving app and am doing it every spare moment I have. I'm taking this very seriously man And I applied for 15 jobs today. That's what I do evey morning now. I'm treating this very seriously. I want you to know

Your right. I didn't. And I'm not throwing that number out there for anything. I'm just saying I'm am doing something instead of just saying. I applied yo evey single job around my house so I can walk to it. I'm taking this to heart. And I get it. I have said this shit 100 times before. But inknow it's different this time.

I am willing to do anything. I'm not just only applying to certain jobs. Anything I see that is over 13 I just apply for. Just letting you know You are absolutely right man. And I have not been one. The only thing I need is health insurance for my shots You have helped me. In ways you don't understand. I'm actually feeling like I got shit done And inhave not felt that for a min Like me cleaning the whole house. I feel so good. Knowing I did that Like talking to the guy today about being able to actually get out of debt. Like that made me so happy. I felt like I could breath. My first thought was like great I can do that then help Chelsea with her debt while keep doing what i need to. And I felt so happy with the image man
Funny enough that is the time limit I gave myself. And I actually like cleaning right nkw. I put in my headphones and go

I did man. I spilled my guts last night and she opened up to me about she truly feels. Like everything I said was true. I talked to her. And now it feels like she doesn't wanna even be around me. So I just keep pushing forward cause that's all I can do. Before I just would of stayed in bed and been said. But Instead I made the bed and got in the shower and went to work. Trying to stop thinking for a min here I said I found two couples therapist that I'd like her to look at to see of she thinks they'd be good. She said she'd loom but in a like... i guess kind of way.

Idk my brother. Maybe. I always wanted kids. Then we stared dating and I was on the fence and the she really didn't want them. So I just put it in the back of my mind Because I'd rather be with her. So idk man. I feel like everything I feel is wrong. All I keep coming back to is just driving. It's the only thing keeping me levled right now I'm not doing good man. She is like completely ignoring me. Only said hi to me after I Said it first in bed. I'm not happy with this. I made mistakes but I have needs to you know. Idk man. I'm just really lost

Just something that she cares man. I keep thinking I wanna be done this is not gonna work. Idk man I feel like I'm drifting to sea. And I'm sorry if I keep saying shit like that. I still know what I have to do for me. I just feel like us is gone

I wanna do that stuff man!!!!! I just don't know where she is. She is giving me nothing. My thinking was to just give her space. Let her reach out when she is ready you know. Since she is like avodiant. I was reading that the more you like be around and stuff the more they see that as needy and pull away.
I don't want them to go back to normal. I wanna find a new normal together I just wanna know that we're in this together. And I don't know and I'm really scared man
Do these things make sense together?
No. I have watched so many like videos on like what I should do that I'm like lost with ideas. I just wanna know what she needs so I can give her that. God I can't wait man.

Thats what I'm working on man. Like I'm afraid to even kiss her goodbye on the head of the fear that that's annoying y g I guess that what I'm looking for is even know I was blindsided by the truth even know it was there all along.

That I lost my way. I lost who I was in the marragie and who I wanted to be come. I lost her trust and lost a sense of myself I wanna text her this so that she does not feel threatened by talking face to face Hi hun, things are really hard right now and I wanna communicate how I feel. I have been giving you space for yourself and wanna make sure this is appropriate right now. I don't want it to look like I just stopped carring.
See man. What I feel is right is wrong. And I'm scared of that She said I wish I felt about you like I used to. And that broke me. I completely understood because I wanna be that person to but better

I think that she has become my drug for being happy. I don't even know how to act around her now. I Need so much work man. I'm so fucked up So maybe I just focus on making my self happy. And let her be her. Like let her talk to me if she wants?
I need to drive, I need a new job, I need to make myself happy. These are mine and no one elses
I have every intention to! I feel like infucking need an interpreter to even talk to the therapist.
I don't know how to process my own emotions. I copy what other people feel around me and thats what I go with.

I imagine everything is ok or will be ok in my head and just i i i i use that to cope as everything really going on is falling apart. I can't answer that buddy. I think that's part of it. Yes. But I think there is more
She's mad that I can't take Care of myself emotionally and other wise. That's what I think I thought I did in some ways but I think now it was a mask or just lieing to myself

I just got off the phone with my therapist. So right now she wants me to talk to Chelsea about what she needs right now. Like no contact or sevile. I have alot of problems man. I never told anyone but Chelsea about this but I was rapped. And i know that sounds so dumb coming from a guy but I was
Raped I have alot of things I need to figure out.
Before Chelsea I told my lady everything man. She said you need to ask Chelsea if she needs complete space right now or if you can talk nicely like friends

So just talked to Chelsea and was good. She said she hasn't given up but she goes back and forth with it and if that ever comes to that point she'd tell me. Also that like no matter what we're friends but we need to work on ourselves right now. I told her that idk if I could just be friends and she said will cross that road if it ever happens. I just got a long road ahead buddy
Becoming the man I wanna be to earn her trust back. Which I'm gonna do or die fucking trying
I think because of becoming emotionally decent again. And just gaining trust back takes time
Thanks I'm gonna get there. For the first time I'm feeling like I actually can
That's what I need to fund out. Truly Emotionally. I know what else I have to do. But I'm starting to Emotionally get started
I'm sorry if your frustrated with me. I understand But this is not just I get a job and drive and life is all good. There is alot more
She said she wants me to do those things for me anyway. Which i do. There is more we have to work on Your mad at me and I can tell. And that's shuting me down more I hear what your saying
So going back to something you said to me. What im hearing is that you are saying get your license and a better job and it will fix it. I could be wrong but that's what I believe you're saying
How else are you going to earn her trust back? I’ll wait. Dude please stop saying it like that. I'm not trying to pick a fight or anything. I'm just saying

No no I don't think that is the only thing missing. Can we maybe talk like over the phone tonight man. Instead of texting. No what your saying is if she asked me for help or to talk about something that is bother her I can be the mature partner who can help her with whatever need she needs right now

Thanks man!!! I just got two phone interviews so I'm excited about that. Can I talk to you tonight. It really helps My biggest thing is I always thought leading ment make the money. But that Is just so not the case
Overcoming Failure to Launch Syndrome: Your Guide to Independence verywellmind.com

If nothing else, two things should stick out to you. First … this section here. Does it sound at all familiar? It is nothing to be ashamed of - it isn’t your “fault”. We cannot blame ourselves and we will not blame others. We cannot shift responsibility for who we are based upon events which shaped our life. We cannot say “I’m upset and sad because ….” Or “I can’t do X yet because …” We will take ownership and accountability. It is something to understand and recognize and overcome. Because …. this section here ….. 2. Lift-off. There is no substitute for action. We must get out there and take a chance. In trying, we release ourselves from the gravitational pull of our habituated, avoidant, and unskillful responses to fears, anxieties, and unrealistic goals. Lifting off may manifest as heading to college, the workforce, and living independently.
Dude this is so me. Like to the t

Yeah there is no. I didn't do this because x. It's just the mind set of do it I have two interviews tomorrow brother that I'm pumped for Thank-you for kicking my ass man. Your so fucking right. Stop waiting to be saved. I love you In person interview Monday!!! Next round I think it's done man. I think she has checked out. I think there might have been some emotional cheating. Right now I think I wanna be done
I hope so to buddy. Idk
I think she wants to end it but feels bad cause I'm like a " good guy" I am. Not going back till Saturday. It's just a feeling I have
She saw her dad?

Oh idk man. She said she might buy idk if she did. I don't know anything right now. All inknow is when she started talking to this guy and this group she changed. Like she was talking with my other friends and they where like teasing him and she got like defensive Idk man just like alot of red flags. And I have said that her being in that discord with these people all the time makes me uncomfortable and she's still doing it. That's like a lack of respect
with you? I left because I think we need time apart But still everything I just said seems valid to me
She's say she still doesn't know. So that's when I suggested time appart
Saturday I wanna go get something things for my new job and ask if she wants to talk. Call?
I'm sorry
I'll let you sleep
I am as well and she agreed with my move of a week apart. I haven't brought up couples counseling since we have take a break
Yeah see if we can talk about our problems together.

I didn't say peace. I said maybe I should go to my mom for the week. She said yeah it's hard to think when I'm like around you know. So that's when I said ok I'll go I thought that is what would be best. I understand

I am. I was talking about it to collen. I'm going home tomorrow because I called the plummer. Drain problems. My thinking is just be there for that then leave. I wanna give her more her time. I don't wanna be like... hey I'm gone a day ready to talk. Is that right? Like idk I'm just not trying to be like over barring Me also going to my mom's and trying to go no contact is what I read is good for people with avoidant stuff. So I thought it was a good idea to bring it up
Exactly. That's what I thought. Sorry I have a problem reading text in certain tones. It's why I think your mad at me alot
It absolutely does and that's exactly was my thinking. Like thats what I knew then the bullshit comes in

I fixed the downstairs toilet lol Chelsea and I had a very open talk last night. About her true feelings. Feelings going back 5 years. So i talked to her. Great talk. So she has felt like she has had to worry about everything about me for like 5 years now. And that the things i have done have unknowingly been emotional manipulation. Alot of what I did was under wrong circumstances of what i thought. Because she was like liying to her therapist because she didn't want me to be the problem. So like this was the first time in like 5 years I actually understand how she feels. She wants like independence in things. Like doing the dishes herself because if I did their might be another reason behind it. She said that the time apart was great then I asked how she was doing and she took it as like me invading her feelings. Which she said like is not fair but since she has been like so tight that the almost took back the feeling of her missing me. To me it's been like 3 weeks since our fight. But for her it's been like 2 days. So it's going to take time. She said not to sound shitty but like i have to like come to you. I understand better now. Still wanna do couples counseling and I said i gave you the stuff and when you are ready we can look it over.

From my understanding things my mom does. Like almost weapon nizing feelings. Like when I leave my moms and she says do you have to and acts sad. Which she is but she is doing it for a purpose right then. Knowing or unknowingly. That and another thing I brought up was when she would bring up ABC in a fight I'd say well xyc effects me this way. Which reflecting now is something else my mom did. Chelsea has tried to tell me these things but right now I f l I' i d i d l t f ll d t d d feel I'm in and open mind place to fully understand and navigate So I told her thank you for being extremely open with me. I took like 10 mins to reflect and wrote down alot and the emailed my therapist to schedule a session Friday. While also keeping are Monday one.

Why? I guess part of like a control problem on her side. Life events and also me not showing up in different ways. Which is why we absolutely need couples counseling. Some of these things I take responsibility for but others I'm sorry to say I can't
Yes. There have been electrical jobs my friends have tried to get me into. And she has said I don't want you to do that. You could doing something wrong end die
Looking back this was also after her step father passed. I think deep down Chelsea is afraid of loss and amendment. Can you explain that a little more buddy

Yes i think that plays a role. My fear is Chelsea is jumping from reason to reason in her therapy session. She has not been honest in the past and that has unfortunately made things worse. So my fear is now I'm the target. Granted I am responsible for my own involvement but I'm afraid she will not see her own problems and work on it Does that make sense. Which again is why we need to go to couples counseling. And brother I'm just saying this to you because I feel safe to express my thoughts with you. I wanna ask these questions instead of just keeping them in and overthinking everything.

My therapist said the same. Like she's not God. She's gonna fuck up her own feelings. Everyone does. Meg is absolutely right. I told Chelsea that I'm moving forward no matter what and the only thing we need to understand is are we going to go together forward on the same road as two people separately going in the same direction together not out of guilt or obligation but out of choice of being together or not. And right now I'm preparing myself for both outcomes no matter what. I am such a bad typer lol I'm so sorry
Keep it up.

Thats how I feel. Like I have told her more then once that fight was the nest thing. It maid me see everything. It made me see truth. I wanna be my own person. Like I wanna please myself first before other people. It's going to be hard as shit but it's what I want. As much as I wanna work on me and Chelsea I like can't worry about that now cause I have to fix myself first. You know? Is that like to cold?

Me to buddy. I'm trying to look at it has a scale almost like. I'm gonna have great days. But unfortunately I'm gonna have bad. And I need to understand that those bad days aren't taking me back to 0. There taking me back a couple of steps. But that's ok!!! Keep going the next day. And the next. The only thing i can truly control is myself. That's scary but it's the truth

Dude I love this guy. He is on Joe Rogan alot. And he is right. All these things that are being brought up. All these things Chelsea is saying. That's how I felt. Like now I know. Truly know what I see and I can move towards changing it! When I didn't get that promotion at work. That was the last straw. I'm tierd of people not telling me truths because I'm a nice guy or whatever. I wanna know So I can go to work. And bro if a year from now Chelsea is like I wanna divorce I'm gonna be like ok. Inknow I did my work. I did my share. And I will keep going and be with someone who appreciate that. I'm done being afraid of what if.
Hahahhaha Can I send you the book I have been working on

6151126429784543050.pdf PDF Document · 77.2 MB I have been wrigjting alot and using ai for spell check and better wording. Dude I have had so much fun! I actually like reading lol So there might be a problem with going Saturday. But I already took steeps to fix it and scheduled another appointment just incase
I like my nuts and have no intonation of having you hit them. Jon Schultz is fucking back and I'm excited
Believe what you want to buddy I can say it's different and all that stuff, but until it's done it's just talk. So I'm not saying anything till I have it in my had
It's. Not the test. It's stuff I need for tbe test. I had to order a new birth certificate. That is the only reason why I love you
I have Laryngitis . So my mom said I should stay home for ed
Thanks buddy
If I'm off that weekend absolutely!!! I know once I start and get my schedule Also what works do you do to get muscles and the pecks of a God

I can't. Maybe 50

She has yeah. Like brought her up dinner to her office and she was like scared. She thought I was gonna run in and like snope and shit. Like wtf. Idk man. She has alot if problems and I'm starting to did I have anxious attachment as bad as I thought? Or am I just used to breadcrumbs Taking to my therapist tomorrow All I know is this way of living is unhealthy for me That’s the story she told me.
Who told you? My mom?

Um just like affection. Like I'm not just talking about sex. Like cuddling or watching a movie. Like she works then plays games all night with her friends I'm just tierd of plays games all night with her friends. I m just tierd of feeling like a toy on a shelf waiting to be played with. But she is avoident. She has said she likes being in there because she does have to contribute much. Like she just talks about games and shit. Nothing real. Nothing with emotions. Idk buddy We have has sex in 2 years Like sex is my ultimate for of being together. I just feel that I have completely changes things about my self to keep the peace. She has absolutely held us together financially. I just feel all the emotional stuff has been on me.

So some nights I think to myself do I even want this to work. Has it always been bad and I was just people pleasing. Whenever I wanted to talk to her about a problem it was always... not now or I can't think about that now. But Whenever she wanted to talk about something we did. ! 1. "We're a Team, Not Opponents" (Still essential to frame the conversation constructively.) “Chelsea, above everything else, we are a team. We're on… I want to talk to you about something that’s been on my mind, but before anything, I need you to know that we’re a team. We’re on the same side, and this isn’t about blame or criticism—it’s about us finding ways to feel closer and safer with each other again. When you withdraw emotionally or shut down, it really affects me. I miss you, and I miss feeling connected to you. Sometimes, it feels like we’re together but drifting apart, and that’s hard for me because I don’t always know how to reach you in those moments. I understand that sometimes you might be overwhelmed, and I don’t want to push you—I just need you to know how much I care and how this impacts me. That said, your feelings and experiences matter just as much as mine. Even if it’s hard to talk about or feels overwhelming, I want you to know that it’s safe to share with me. I will always respect your need for space, but when you’re ready, I genuinely want to listen and understand, without judgment. I love you, and I want us to keep growing together. Let’s figure this out in a way that works for both of us.

Avoidant Attachment in Action: It creates a yo-yo effect… You feel needed → then abandoned → then temporarily wanted again → then ghosted. And each time, your self-worth takes a hit. But here’s what’s really happening to you: You're being trained to wait. To walk on eggshells. To settle for breadcrumbs. To hope instead of expect. You’re not a toy. You’re not an emotional punching bag. You’re a damn human being who shows up—with your heart in your hands—and asks for a real connection.
